Introduction by Christina Stiles, publisher

Ten Reasons Why Kids Should Play Games by Jodi Black, Pinnacle Entertainment Group and Carolina Game Tables
Gamer Dads With Gamer Girls by Paris Crenshaw, freelancer and Waysides editor
Fun & Facts: Educating With RPGs by BJ Hensley, owner of Playground Adventures and Marketing Director for Lone Wolf




R*aising a Conscientious Gamer Son by Monica Marolowe, Paizo RPG Superstar!

Raising Gamer Girls by Rachel Ventura, Legendary Games

207506.name: Galaxy Golf
207506.description:
Tee-time in another dimension! Galaxy Golf is Liftoff Labs’ debut, bringing the fairway into the space age in a VR game like no other.

Our galactic golf courses span nine planets each. Every planet has its own gravity field and features unique obstacles and challenges along the way. Begin by exploring Pleasant Hills and enjoy a mellow course with a pastoral vibe – and then level up your skills against the hellish infernos in Frosty Brimstone. Will you chip your way to a safe score, or blast your ball into orbit as you try to sink a hole-in-one?

Galaxy Golf’s controls are designed independently for all of the major VR platforms, leveraging the strengths of each device. Physically spin the planet and grab your ball using Vive touch controls, or intuitively navigate and aim with your gaze on mobile VR and Oculus Rift. No flat-screen golf game can give you the sense of space or the level of aiming precision achievable in VR. Truly, we live in the future.

Source: The Developer Website.

207507.name: SpecTrek
207507.description:
SpecTrek is an augmented reality ghost hunting game. SpecTrek was designed to have the user work-out whilst playing the game, the tag line for the game is "protect the world, stay in shape". There are three default games to play, short which lasts 15 minutes, medium which lasts for 30 minutes, and long which lasts for 60 minutes. SpecTrek projects ghosts at various locations on a Google map in either a predetermined search radius or a user defined search radius.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SpecTrek SpecTrek]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

207508.name: E.X. Troopers
207508.description:
The game begins with the approach of spacecrafts transporting enlistees to Neo Venus Construction Inc. (NEVEC) Academy's educational institutions on the planet E.D.N. III. Bren Turner, a candidate from E.D.N. II, is on board among the new recruits when the fleet is suddenly attacked by mysterious VSs. To confront the hostile force, Instructor Walter Stingray selects Bren to pilot a prototype VS equipped with a next-generation AI, capable of even autonomous behaviour. As the new "master" of this state-of-the-art machine, Bren designates it with the name "Gingira" and joins Walter to defend the fleet.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.X._Troopers E.X. Troopers]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

207525.name: Pyramid (Volume 3, Issue 94 - Aug 2016)
rpgissuearticle: So You Want to Build a Spaceship
207525.description:
Space is a pretty big place.

Learn your way around it well enough to create five-star campaigns in this month's issue of Pyramid, the PDF magazine for roleplayers. In “So You Want To Build a Spaceship” by Roger Burton West and Timothy Ponce, you'll find out how to build spaceships to fit the feel of your campaign – whether your story is one of slick intergalactic exploration or simply working stiffs getting by in space. This month in David L. Pulver's column, get ideas for introducing contraband, smuggling, and grey market goods into your space game. And there's plenty more interstellar content where that came from!

- Publisher's description

207538.name: Hästspelet
207538.description:
Hästspelet is action-packed, eventful, fun and exciting game for everyone.

Hästspelet is a board game where you compete against each other to become the first to achieve three milestones.
These three milestones are: building up the horse farm, win races and to collect a certain amount of money.

The game can be played at three levels: local, regional or national.
The levels affect the playtime and requirements of the milestones.

Some of the things that can happen during the game, competing in dressage, jumping and trot, chasing money, questions and fun and less fun "Mockor"
Mockor are random events that can affect both you and others of good and evil.

The questions for the game are mixed in different categories and divided into three age groups: children, youth and adults.
This means that you will compete on the same terms.
The questions and "Mockor" are on an APP that is available for free download for both Android and Apple.
The APP requires no internet connection after installation.

You don’t have be a horse person to play this Hästspelet, likewise to you don’t have to be a broker to play monopoly.

Preparations
It requires the free app Hästspelet downloaded to a phone or tablet.
The app contains the questions and mockor needed to play. The download and installation takes a few minutes. The app requires no internet connection after installation. In the meantime you can prepare the bank with banknotes and read the rules. Unfold and place the game board so that everyone reaches it. Before the game begins, all players must agree on what level they will select.

The start
Start by placing the buildings "house and stables" in all the blank squares on the game board. This area represents each player's horse farm. Then distribute the SEK 50 000, a horse farm card, a holder for the game piece and a horse for all participants. The horse should be the same color as the two boxes labeled "Inackordering" on the board.
All then select the respective game character piece, attach it to its holder that has the same color as the horse. Place the game character piece in the starting box. Let a roll of the dice to decide who starts playing.
Always roll two dice during the game (with the exception of mockorna). The order is always clockwise. The bank pays out 30 000 SEK each time a player passes the starting box.

The milestones
Milestone 1 - Build a horse farm
Horse farm built by landing on the "Mäklare” (Broker) ", where the player can buy buildings to their horse farm. You can buy several buildings at the same time. Read on horse farm card for more information.

Milestone 2 - Gain Diploma
Diplomas obtained by winning races. The Bank manages the distribution of the award to the winner of a contest, with the prize money standing on diploma card.
The winner and runner-up parts of the money in the pot. If the pot is uneven it is awarded to the winner advantage.

Milestone 3 - Cash
Cash acquire it through: to win races, coming second in the competitions, the boarders at your horse farm, answering the question right, pass the Start box, some mockor and on the horse market where you can sell.

There are special Contest Rules for "jumping", "Dressage" and "racetrack" because it is a competitive element of the game that often occur. Much because of the desire to win money, which in turn generates that one can buy buildings to their horse farm. Last but not least, you will gain a diploma when you win.

There are rules for three and two players and rules for five and four players that is slightly different from when there is 6 players.

What makes this game a little unique is precisely the balance of the questions and mockorna, racing adrenaline and the crazy events that may occur in mockorna. And also fun with an APP for a board game, it makes it feel new and fresh.

This month, the two versions of our monster are fairly different. For Labyrinth Lord, we have a dungeon section full of secret doors, strange loot, and threats like the VAT ZOMBIES, along with a sizeable selection of other zombie types you may enjoy.

207543.description:

The monster this month is the puppet golems. In the Dungeon World version, they are the leaders of a criminal gang.

207545.name: Puppet Golems

Check out the next installment, Wyrd Chronicles Vol. 25!

Designing New Masters: A look at coming up with the new Masters.
Puppet Strings: Watch the Bunraku take to the stage!
Praise the Oyabun: Painting the Shadow Emissary.
Chain Gang: A day in the life of convict labor.
Creation of New Gremlin Families: A glimpse of Into the Bayou's Gremlin families
Rust and Ruin: A Through the Breach adventure
Family Feud: A Malifaux story encounter

207547.name: Madman, Interrupted
207547.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sometimes the only way to stay sane is to get tossed into an asylum.

Unfortunately for the staff at the Malifaux Sanitarium, one of their patients has mysteriously disappeared from his cell. The guards are concerned for their jobs and have turned to the Fated to help them find their missing patient, but is everything at the Sanitarium really what it seems?

207548.name: Good Neighbors
rpgseries: A World of Adventure for Fate Core System
207548.description:
From publisher blurb:

In Good Neighbors, the Fair Folk have lived in peace with the humans of Still Hollow for centuries. But now, outsiders are coming into Still Hollow in search of gas deep beneath the earth.The Industry does not respect the old ways. Their machines disturb the dwellings of the Fair Folk, and the filth that seeps into the ground around their wells is deadly.
In Good Neighbors, players take on two roles: a human who must deal with the politics of this new industry, and a fairy who feels the full spiritual damage of the Industry. Can your humans enact change to make Still Hollow safe again, or will your fairies need to enact their own justice? Find out in this Fate World of Adventure by Paul Stefko.

Good Neighbors requires Fate Core to play. This 48-page supplement contains:

A streamlined system to allow players to create two characters for use in a single campaign or game session
A profession system with packaged aspects & skills to allow for quick character generation
Rules for fairies and fae magic in Fate using Fate Accelerated approaches
A Reaction Tree system to help GMs easily combine two storylines — in this case, fairy and human — into a single game scenario
Human and fairy sample characters, Industry insiders, and plenty of Still Hollow locations to get you gaming fast




They say good times make good neighbors. These are bad times.

207550.name: Chronicles of Aerthe Quick-Start Guide
207550.description:
Publishers Blurb
Arete is where it all begins. A rebuilt world 50 years after the Convergence, echoes of other worlds have changed Aerthe’s landscape. Forests exist within deserts and cities abide by different laws of both nature and magic due to realities merging together. This is a place where dragons roam the skies and magic can be both dangerous and beneficial.

The continent is ruled by the Cleric Lords and their Faith Militant—corrupt, overzealous puritans who hunt down any that oppose the Faiths laws and power. The Guilds battle amongst themselves for wealth and control over the cities and trade. Secretly they work together to fund and train the Archons, a specialized unit of agents created to exist in any reality and to be the front-line in the inevitable war against the Faith.

Fractures in reality act as gateways to other Aerthe's, these may be ruled by different laws of magic and physics, they may have experienced disasters that have turned them into Ice, desert or dead worlds. Each new realm will bring new races and religions, new monsters and enemies. As characters you can explore these new worlds or exist within them, the options are endless.

Watching from betwixt the parallel, lurking in the empty spaces that holds the web of reality together, are the Dark Gods. These malicious and cunning beings wait as the fabric of matter weakens, approaching the time when they can descend to take their rightful place as rulers of the Aerthe.

You must pick your side or choose to feed off both, but whatever you decide, destiny cannot be avoided. The fate of the Tapestry of Worlds is in your hands,

207551.name: Disease Table
207551.description:
From publisher blurb:

The diseases on this table all actually exist. The symptoms, contagiousness and untreated mortality rates are estimated based on World Health Organization statistics, so roll a d20 and see what happens!

207552.name: Golem: An Adventure
207552.description:
From the introduction:

This adventure takes place in the Hedgerows of France in the early days of July 1944, with the Allied forces just beginning their advance into the heart of the countryside. Many French towns and villages have cooperated with the German occupation, but some brave men and women fight against their Nazi captors with their very lives. These people, the French Resistance, work with the Allied forces to infiltrate, spy and fight the Germans at every chance.

User summary:

This is the "demonstration adventure" for the system and was distributed by free download.

207553.name: HardCube
207553.description:
User Summary

You guide a tennis ball around a suspended maze as quickly as possible.

videogamehonor: 2015 AzPlay Awards Best Basque Game Nominee
207555.description:
8DAYS is a crazy dual stick shooter in which you play as a mercenary for G.O.D. Inc. (“Gold Oil and Diamonds” - GOOD Nasdaq). G.O.D has become the world leader in the Private Military Company (PMC) sector.

Source: The Developer Website.

207556.name: Rifts: Archetypes Set 1
207556.description:
From publisher blurb:

Get to the action faster using our “print and play” pregenerated Archetype characters!

These ready-to-play archetypes for Savage Rifts® include:

Cyber-Knight
Glitter Boy
Juicer
Ley Line Walker
Mind Melter
Operator

207557.name: Orctoberfest
207557.description:
Welcome to the Orctoberfest, where all creatures of the fantasy world are invited to have a beer and a sausage before the next bumpy rollercoaster ride. This yearly fair is pretty crowded, though, and long queues await the visitors before they are able to quench their thirst.

In the role-selection game Orctoberfest, the players try to satisfy their characters by reducing their waiting time in the queues for bratwurst, beer and pretzels. The sooner a character gets served, the happier he is, leaving the queue for the beer hall. The player with the most happiness at the end of the game wins — but not everybody plays fair and wants to wait for their turn, trying to jump the queue, or worse, using their body odor to scare others out of the waiting line.

Different character abilities provide interesting decisions for the players throughout the game. Playing the right character at the right time, assessing the situation on the table correctly, and predicting the plays of your opponents are the keys to victory in this fast-playing queue-building game.

207558.name: Lankhmar: The Eyes of Goro'mosh
207558.description:
From Publisher Blurb:


The Eyes of Goro'mosh contains four Savage Tale adventures designed to be interspersed among other Lankhmar Savage Tales or those of the Game Master's own creation, with a climactic ending on the Street of the Gods!

This product requires Lankhmar: City of Thieves and the Savage Worlds core rules to play.

207559.description:
Star Trek - Attack Wing: Muratas Expansion Pack is part of the Wave 29 expansion packs from WizKids Games, and this expansion comes with one new ship and a new set of cards for Star Trek: Attack Wing.

The Muratas is a Xindi Reptilian Warship class ship.
207559.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing –  Muratas Expansion Pack
boardgamefamily: Star Trek: Attack Wing Miniatures Game

207560.name: Toro
207560.description:
TORO, is the first bullfighting arcade videogame designed for the last generation consoles, XBOX and PS4, as well as for PC.

It will challenge your skills, reflects and fast reactions interacting with 500 kg bulls. Your goal is to execute the passes you chose correctly, to keep the bull's attention at all times, to execute the highest number of combos possible (when you link various passes together) and to pass the specific challenges you are set for the event. Before bullfighting in each ring you will be given a series of different CHALLENGES which you have to pass to win points. By passing these challenges you will win enough Fame to be able to get into the next level of bullrings.

You will be able to face the bravest bulls ever digitalized in the most famous bullrings worldwide, and become a number one bullfighter .

Source: The Developer Website.

207561.name: Tricky
207561.description:
A 2-player abstract game, designed by C. W. Cowsley and distributed by Applied Technology in 1989. The game consists of twelve top-hat shaped tokens (10 yellow numbered from 1-10, 1 red and 1 blue), the instructions, and a green cloth bag which doubles up as a double-sided game board.

One player plays as Red, the other as Blue. The object of the game is to capture the highest total of numbered yellow tokens, without your own token being captured by your opponent. The tokens are designed so that they can be easily pressed together, so that the players' red and blue tokens gradually accumulate a stack of yellow tokens underneath them as the game progresses.

The board consists of ten circles, connected by lines in a geometric pattern. There are two variant configurations, one printed on each side of the cloth bag. The game is played in two phases: firstly, each player alternately places one numbered token on a circle until all ten have been placed; secondly players take turns moving their red or blue token along the lines from circle to circle, capturing tokens as they move, until either all ten numbered tokens have been captured - or one player has blundered allowing their own token to be captured! The advantage of going first is mitigated by placing an upper limit on the first token that the starting player may capture - in the basic game, this is fixed at 6; in the advanced game this is decided by auction.

207562.name: War Machines of the 21st Century Volume 1: Robots
207562.description:
From the introduction:

War Machines of the 21st Century Volume 1: Robots provides various types of robots for you to use in your campaigns. Robots are common in science fiction settings. The default setting for these robots is a war-torn planet earth in the distant future. Each robot has a brief history of use and suggestions for using them in your campaigns.

207563.name: Mind Over Alma Matter
207563.description:
The Psionics Supplement

From the introduction:

Nothing spices up a fantasy roleplaying game like new rules for psionics! And thus, Mind Over Alma Mater, the supplement which introduces psionics to Wandering Monsters High School.

207564.name: Terror in the Darkness
207564.description:
A Compleate Encounter Under the Surface of the Old World

From the introduction:

Johann's story is simple. He is the mayor of Karstenberg, and the sole source of the income for the villagers is a small silver-mine. The yield is meagre, but it is just enough to get by on. However, two men have recently disappeared in the mine. Axel Muller vanished 19 days before the Characters meet Johann, and Kurt Zondervan vanished 8 days ago. They were alone, doing maintenance work, when they vanished. No trace of their bodies has been found, but some of their equipment was recovered, littered over some distance.

207565.name: Art Collectors: The Game
207565.description: Welcome to the game of Art Collectors! Art Collectors is a game of risk-taking and judgment. You, the art collectors, must assess artworks and bid to win them into your collections. One player assumes the role of the art critic, whose role is to appraise artworks and reward players who have found truly great works of art. The art collectors may bid however they'd like – big or small – but the actual value of the artwork is determined by the art critic. Whoever (art collector) profits the most by bidding smart or collects in the most prolific manner wins the game.

207566.description: This is a special limited edition piece for collectors. A 3D version of the gunslinger's six-shooter for Shadows of Brimstone: City of Ancients. This set comes with a 3D six-shooter and twelve 3D bullets - 6 white, 2 green, 2 red, 2 blue. These bullets fit easily in the notches on the six-shooter and will ensure that your bullets are locked in, even when the game table gets bumped!
boardgameaccessory: Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients
207566.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Deluxe 3D Resin Six-Shooter Template

207567.name: Kiai Resonance
207567.description:
User Summary

This 2D fighting game features duels between sword-wielding samurai.

207568.description:
Baptism By Fire: The Battle of Kasserine, February 1943 (Battalion Combat Series [BCS]) chronicles the first real ground operations by the US Army in the ETO in WW2. Every wargamer knows this battle was a severe Allied setback. What is not obvious, however, is that Allied troops on the ground gave a good account of themselves against the remnants of Rommel's vaunted Afrika Korps, despite the ineffective and confused leadership that existed at Corps level.

In the end, while GIs and Tommies fought their guts out to make up for the mistakes of their leadership, the advantages achieved by initial Axis successes were allowed to blow away in the wind by an equally detached and confused Axis High Command. In its case, how to best exploit the results of their initial attack depended on an argument raging within the Italian Commando Supremo and the persuasive abilities of Albert Kesselring and Erwin Rommel. After much discussion and the loss of several crucial days, the Axis decided on the less ambitious plan, which was itself no longer even possible.

Baptism By Fire is the second game in the Battalion Combat Series, which took players by storm with its block buster initial release Last Blitzkrieg. The game is designed as a more accessible entry to the system for those who want something smaller and faster than the earlier monster game. Here the wide open desert, limited number of Formations, and short scenario length provide players with a rapid and fun introduction to the series, the chance to develop their play skills to become a more effective BCS player overall, and to take a good look at this poorly understood battle.

Once again, the masterful order of battle research by Carl Fung showcases the forces involved with more fine detail than ever before. As a result, the common misconceptions of hapless GIs and Afrika Korps supermen is put to rest.

To give players a better feel for the pulse of the battle, the Germans run rampant for a few turns but then must idle back for several more while their commanders figure out what the overall objective will be. The player selects this objective randomly in the middle of the game, and it determines his Victory Conditions. This precludes the Axis player from overusing his limited combat power beforehand (since he might be going down the wrong road, literally) and keeps the Allies off balance as they must protect against both possibilities.

With a campaign game of only 10 turns, multiple plays are readily possible and various strategies for both sides can be explored.

Scenarios:
Kasserine Campaign, 2 maps, 10 Turns
Operation Spring Wind, 1 map, 4 Turns
Mid-Campaign Start, 2 maps, 5 Turns
Between a Rock and a Hard Place, 1 map, 5 Turns
End Campaign Start, 2 maps, 3 Turns
High Water Mark, 1 map, 3 Turns
Components:

BCS rulebook (version 1.1, in full color)
Two BCS Charts and Tables
BCS Crib Notes Booklet
BBF Game Specific rulebook
Two 22” x34” Full Color Game Maps
560 Counters (one sheet of units and one BCS marker sheet)
6 scenarios total, 3 one-map scenarios
Box and Dice
207568.name: Baptism By Fire: The Battle of Kasserine

207569.name: Game Trade Magazine (Issue 198 - Aug 2016)

207569.description:

207570.name: Dungeonology
rpgcategory: Non-Rankable Item (item will not show in the rankings)
207570.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The world's most beloved role-playing game, Dungeons & Dragons, joins the legendary 'Ology series as Volo the Wizard takes you on an unforgettable journey to the Forgotten Realms. From the dreaming spires of Waterdeep to the frozen majesty of Drizzt Do'Urden's Icewind Dale, and from the despicable Underdark to the mysterious Underchasm, you'll learn the history, secrets, and wonders of this incredible world.

207571.name: Monsters and Heroes of the Realms Coloring Book
rpgissuearticle: The Pencil is Mightier Than the Sword
rpgcategory: Non-Rankable Item (item will not show in the rankings)
207571.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Go on a journey through the fabled Forgotten Realms and color in an array of monsters, rogues, heroes and villains!

Monsters and Heroes of the Realms: a Dungeons & Dragons Coloring Book is a treasure trove of illustrations summoned from the pages of the official Dungeons & Dragons manuals. It features never-before-seen artwork and it includes sixteen pages of inspirational full-color illustrations. In this book the pen is mightier than the sword!

207572.name: Holland '44: Operation Market-Garden
207572.description:
Holland '44 is a two-player game depicting the Allies’ combined ground and airborne attack in the Netherlands during WWII, which was code named Operation Market-Garden.

The game starts with the airborne landings on September 17th and continues until September 23rd. The Allied player must rush his ground forces forward as fast as possible to relieve his beleaguered airborne divisions and capture a bridge across the Rhine.

The scale of the map is 2 kilometers per hex and covers the battlefield from the Belgium border to Arnhem. The map also includes the area where the British 8th Corps fought on the right flank of 30th Corps.

Most units in Holland ‘44 are battalions, but some company size units are included.

Holland '44 uses a system very similar to Ardennes '44. It is basically a simple move-fight, I-go then u-go game. If you have played Ardennes ‘44 or Normandy '44 you will have no trouble learning the game. Rules such as ZOC Bonds, Determined Defense, Extended Movement, and Traffic Markers all make their reappearance. Due to the terrain of the Netherlands, special attention was given to river crossings, bridge building, and fighting in the flat polder terrain.

207573.name: Istanbul: Caravan Leader Mini Expansion
207573.description:
For this expansion, a new meeple is added: a black camel. During the game, the owner of this camel is known as the Caravan Leader.

At the beginning of the game the black camel is placed on the Caravansery (6), it does not have an owner at this point.

If you execute the action in the Caravansery , take the black camel at the end of your turn and put it in front of you; you are now the Caravan Leader.You remain the Caravan Leader until another player executes the action in the Caravansery.

If you are already the Caravan Leader before you execute the action in the Caravansery , you receive the bonus of the Caravan Leader: After taking 2 bonus cards, you don´t discard any cards from your hand.

207574.description:
You are taking a trip to Venice, where the famous carnival is held.
While walking around, a masked lady challenges you to a gem hunt in the middle of a canal.
Use the planks to go from pile to pile to find your way through this labyrinth!

Each player picks a colour and has to collect four gems: rubies for the red player, diamonds for the white player, emeralds for the green player and topazes for the yellow player. Use your stock of planks to go from one pile to another.
A player wins the game if he/she is the first to collect all 4 gems of his/her colour.

The game can then continue to determine who comes second, third and fourth.
207574.name: Venise

207575.name: Creatures of the Galaxy Adversary Deck
rpg: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire
207575.description:
From the publisher's website:

No matter where your Star Wars Roleplaying campaign leads you, the Creatures of the Galaxy Adversary Deck allows you to enhance your settings with different creatures that might be native to the environment. The Rancor, the Wampa, and the Nexu – they're all in there, as are a number of beasts your characters might hope to train as mounts or companions.

Whether your characters encounter them in combat or in other situations, the twenty different creatures from this Adversary Deck all come to life with functional stats, evocative descriptions, and full-color artwork. And because you can find all this information on each creature card, your Creatures of the Galaxy Adversary Deck can save you valuable time that you might have spent thumbing through your rulebooks while your characters were trekking through the wilds of alien worlds.

207576.name: Imperials & Rebels II Adversary Deck
rpg: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire
207576.description:
From the publisher's website:

There are very few places in the galaxy where one might conceivably escape the ongoing conflicts of the Galactic Civil War. The Empire holds hundreds of systems and planets firmly under its control, and there's always a chance you'll run into one or members of the Rebel Alliance anytime you travel to one of the worlds upon which the Empire doesn't have quite as firm a grip.

As a result, it's possible to run into characters from the different sides of the conflict no matter where you go, and you can give these characters immediate color and personality with the Imperials & Rebels II Adversary Deck. With NPCs ranging from Imperial bureaucrats and assassins to Mon Calamari Commanders and Rebel Quartermasters, this Adversary Deck can add color to all manner of different situations you might find in your Star Wars® Roleplaying campaign, not just combat encounters.

All the pertinent for each NPC is printed on its card, along with a short description and art piece.

207577.name: Hunters & Force Users Adversary Deck
rpg: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire
207577.description:
From the publisher's website:

Although the Jedi Order was torn apart by Emperor Palpatine, Darth Vader, and the coordinated efforts of Order 66, there are still Force-sensitive individuals scattered about the galaxy. They may be rare, and the galaxy may be vast, but fate has a way of drawing these remaining Force-sensitive characters toward each other.

With the Hunters & Force Users Adversary Pack, you can find more ways to bring these characters together in your Star Wars® Roleplaying campaign. You may have bounty hunters paid by the Empire to track down Force-sensitive individuals. You may find reluctant mentors among the fallen Jedi. Or you may find Force users who have turned to the dark side and who can serve as ferocious and deadly nemeses for your characters.

Whatever you're hoping to find, there's a good chance you'll find it in this Adversary Deck; even if the Force guides you to encounters with Droidekas or a Jakobeast, its twenty different adversary cards have got you covered.

207578.name: Hand of Manus
207578.description:
In Hand of Manus players take roles of craftsman guild leaders, competing to construct and present the best hand for valorous warrior Manus, who lost his hand in a battle.
Each round players design and then test their constructs in a test room. A hand consists of three parts - shoulder, forearm and wrist and each part has affinity to different elements, so it's performance depends on testing conditions. Every round players bet on expected performance for their hand and then secretly influence testing conditions. Whoever fulfills their bet scores points accordingly, and a first player to get 12 points wins.

207579.name: AbrakaRun
207579.description:
AbrakaRun is a game in which we will play the role of a wizard. He will have to move on a board to get first to the finish line, the King's Castle.
We will cast spells (yes, you are right in reading "spells") in order to move around the board because we want to become the greatest wizard of this Kingdom.
We will have "hidden" tokens to cast a spell and it will require a good memory on our part to use them. These important magic words are needed not only to get ahead, but also to fight the other wizards whose aim is to reach the goal too.

Description in Spanish:
ABRAKARUN, un juego donde interpretaremos el papel de un mago que deberá avanzar por un tablero para conseguir llegar el primero a la meta, el castillo del Rey.

Para avanzar, usaremos hechizos (sí, has leído bien, hechizos) porque queremos ser el mayor mago del reino. Para invocar esos hechizos necesitaremos ingredientes, que encontraremos en forma de tokens ocultos por lo que necesitaremos una buena memoria para poder utilizar los hechizos.

Estos hechizos no sólo nos permitirán avanzar, sino que también podremos atacar al resto de magos que intentan llegar al castillo y perjudicarles en su loca carrera hacia la meta.

207580.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Sabine's TIE Fighter Expansion Pack
207580.description:
Game description from the publisher:

The ubiquitous TIE fighter was one of the Empire’s most common symbols of oppression. When one of these nimble crafts fell into the hands of Rebel saboteur and artist Sabine Wren, she knew exactly how to customize it for use against the Empire. Brilliantly repainted and retooled, the TIE fighter from the Sabine’s TIE Fighter Expansion Pack for X-Wing comes with four unique ship cards and six upgrades, including the Sabine’s Masterpiece Title, which allows your Rebels to outfit the ship with crew and illicit upgrades.

207581.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Quadjumper Expansion Pack
boardgameversion: Star Wars X-Wing : Quadjumper (french first edition)
207581.description:
Game description from the publisher:

First appearing in The Force Awakens, the quadjumper arrives to X-Wing as a Scum and Villainy ship, full of new maneuvers and dirty tricks. In addition to its pre-painted quadjumper miniature, the Quadjumper Expansion Pack allows you to militarize this typically unarmed ship with four Scum pilots and eight upgrades. These include new crew members, illicit technologies, and a modification that grants extra versatility to your tractor beam tokens. Finally, a unique elite pilot talent and associated condition help your elite pilots pay back their debts against those who have done them wrong.

207582.description:
Description from the publisher:

Make your opponents fear the First Order and the dark side of the Force with the Upsilon-class Shuttle Expansion Pack for X-Wing! It features one pre-painted, large-base miniature of the sleek, predatory shuttle that the First Order typically used to escort its high-ranking officers. Boasting both powerful weapons and shields, the shuttle also comes with a full complement of fifteen upgrades. These include advanced new technologies as well as the dark side warrior Kylo Ren, who allows you to hinder your foes with his associated condition, I’ll Show You the Dark Side.
207582.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Upsilon-class Shuttle Expansion Pack

207583.name: Arbela: Gaugamela, 331 BC
207583.description: Explore Alexander's decisive battle in a card-based system designed by Richard Berg. This is not a "card-driven" game, nor one with a traditional mapboard, but one in which the units and leaders themselves are cards that capture the abilities and appearance of the two armies. Cards face, move, and fight within their own grid. Game options include a "historical" battle deployment or allowing you to "do better" on your own.

207584.name: Evil Robot Traffic Jam HD
207584.description:
Evil Robot Traffic Jam is a tower defense game built from the ground up for virtual reality. Play as an agent of the Evil Robot Defense Force: place powerful defense towers, activate destructive special abilities, and disrupt the robots with hacker drones!

Source: The Developer Website.

207585.name: Super Destronaut
207585.description:
User Summary

A standard shoot em' up.

207586.name: SizeBlock
207586.description:
https://www.facebook.com/Atriagames

Levels are represented as labyrinths with loads of traps, jigsaws and other challenges. The task is simple – just bring the cube to the final destination… However, that’s not that simple as it seems! Some of the obstacles can change, size, shape and even behavior of your cube!

207587.name: Band of Brothers:  Old Breed South Pacific
207587.description:
Band of Brothers: Old Breed South Pacific is a fast playing game of squad level combat in WWII. It covers the exploits of the U.S. First Marine Division in the battles for Guadalcanal. The rules are very simple (no combat charts are needed) with very few exceptions to remember and yet the game is meant to be all encompassing and will include infantry, tanks, and artillery.

Based on years of research, the game system uses a unique suppression mechanic. There are no longer two unique states for a unit, but varying degrees of suppression. This allows suppression to accumulate from multiple fire sources and means that the unit will not take a morale check until it is asked to do something. You will never know for sure how your units will respond until they are needed.

Although casualties can be caused by artillery and heavy weapons (which makes them prime battlefield targets), squads will never cause significant casualties shooting at range at dug in, first line troops. Their goal is to fire and maneuver. Sections of the enemy force must be pinned down and eliminated from up close. The system itself forces this realistic play. In a similar fashion, the system rewards you for spreading your troops out and other realistic game play.

Another unique feature of the game is its use of Proficiency and Casualty ratings to differentiate squads in areas besides just morale.

Old Breed South Pacific is a STAND ALONE GAME, but is also part of a growing series of tactical games.

Band of Brothers: Screaming Eagles is the first in the series and follows the U.S. 101st Airborne Division.

Band of Brothers: Ghost Panzer is the second in the series and follows the German 11th Panzer Division.

Band of Brothers: Texas Arrows is a dependant expansion that follows the U.S. 36th Infantry Division.

207588.name: Game of the Gods
207588.description: 2-3 player strategy game with a 2 team 4 player cooperative variant. Set in Ancient Greece, players try to reach the Golden Fleece and bring it to any of the 4 cities at the corners of the board. Opponents try to trap or land on the player with the Golden Fleece. Trapped players are teleported to the corner squares minus the Fleece. The winner is the first player to get the Fleece to a corner square / city.

207589.description:
This card was given as a promo at Gen Con 2016.

Card Description- During your starting phase: You may discard a card of your choice from your hand. If you do, you may immediately draw 1 card.
207589.name: Tanto Cuore: Aino Svensen

207590.name: Bizarre Earthquake
207590.description:
User Summary

Bizarre Earthquake is a 3rd person point & click adventure game about a seismologist and her assistant made by the Turkish game development studio Proximity Games.

boardgamecompilation: Mystic Vale: Das Tal der Magie & Das Tal der Wildnis
207591.description: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic introduces 54 new advancement cards and 18 vale cards to the Mystic Vale base game, expanding player’s options and opening up new crafting combinations. This expansion is designed to be mixed straight into the base game, introduces effects that trigger "when bought" on some of the vale cards, and has a slight emphasis on Guardian power on the card advancements.
207591.name: Mystic Vale: Vale of Magic

207592.name: Relativity
207592.description:
User Summary

Relativity is an action adventure - puzzle virtual reality game.

207593.name: UBERMOSH Vol.3
207593.description:
User Summary

UBERMOSH Vol.3 is the second stand-alone expansion of the UBERMOSH.

207594.name: UBERMOSH
207594.description:
User Summary

UBERMOSH is an arcade style action game with a cyberpunk theme.

207595.name: Fox Hunt
207595.description:
From the back cover:

It's early June, 1944. The Allied armies stationed in the United Kingdom have spent every one of the last few days waiting on tenterhooks. Would the invasion of Normandy finally launch or will it be delayed again?

As members of the Talent Operation Group, your team has a plum of a mission. Of course, that means they're not allowed to talk about it to anyone or where anyone could overhear, which is a shame.

They're going to kidnap Erwin Rommel.


User comment:

Scenario originally published in Gygax magazine, issue #5.

207596.name: UBERMOSH:BLACK
207596.description:
User Summary

UBERMOSH:BLACK is the hardcore version of the arcade game UBERMOSH.

207597.name: Operation: Rendezvous Oasis
207597.description:
From the back cover:

The United State Army and Central Intelligence Agency have lost two microdrones on Middle East surveillance missions.

Recovery missions have not found any evidence of microdrone malfunction or disintegration. Internal device tracking shows each microdrone was successfully launched and on its way to its target when it ceased to follow remote control directions. Each moved laterally from the line of flight and to the proximity of Ahmed Pursun El-Karriah. Moment later the tracking systems stopped functioning and camera functions went blank.

El-Karriah is a known non-lethal arms and military surplus equipment dealer. Sources have learned he will be attending the annual rendezvous for battlefield scavengers. This year the rendezvous will be held at an oasis located where the borders of Chad, Libya, and Sudan meet. The remote oasis is far from known ground and aerial routes and satellite imagery shows little except irrigated date palms surrounded by a Sand Ridge. It is believed that if El-Karriah has the microdrones, he will sell them to the highest bidders.

Your mission, should you decide to accept it, is to attend the rendezvous and retrieve the two microdrones. If possible, find out how the microdrones are being intercepted and by whom. As always, should you or any of your Top Secret force be caught or killed, the Administrator will disavow any knowledge of your actions.


User comment:

Scenario originally published in Gygax magazine, issue #4.

207598.name: Adventure Of Thieves
207598.description:
User Summary

Advemture of Thieves is a platform PvP arena game.

207599.name: Cosmic Supreme
207599.description: An expansion bundle that included More Cosmic Encounter, Simply Cosmic, and two additional player hexes in dark green and brown.

207600.name: 100 Magical Items of Varying Utility
207600.description:
Publisher blurb:

One hundred original magic items, many of which are barely useful, though some might inspire mighty quests to retrieve them!

207602.name: Goodwill
207602.description:
In GoodWill, you play an investor, trying to maximize his capital by buying and selling the shares of 3 companies, thanks to the privileged information you have access to.

Each turn, each investor has a look at two end-of-turn events, changing prices resources, rationalizing production chain of a firm or advertising occurring that help a firm gain market shares...
Based on this information, players will estimate a price for each firm. Players who gave lowest price will send a share to the one who gave the highest price.

207603.name: Don't Disturb
207603.description:
User Summary

Don’t Disturb places you in the role of a dog who traverses the underworld to find your long lost (and dead) owner. By solving puzzles and making key choices, you can affect how the story ends.

207604.name: Storm King's Thunder DM Quests
207604.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Dungeon Master Quests are a series of out-of-game quests that DMs can undertake during the course of a specific season's adventures.

These quests provide rewards for not only their characters, but characters belonging to other players as well!

Season Five: Storm King’s Thunder

User summary:

Distributed as four separate PDF files, three of which present concise print-and-play components.

207605.name: Waybury U
207605.description:
A Ridiculous Tabletop Module

From the introduction:

Congratulation on being accepted, and welcome to The Waybury University and Elemental Academy of Magic! The following is a primer to familiarise new students with the rules of the university, its expectations, the staff and facilities.

Waybury U accommodates the following classes most easily: Wizard, Sorcerer Cleric, Bard, but has little to offer other classes, particularly Fighter, Barbarian, or Monk. The recommended starting level is 1 to accommodate a sense of early growth, and the game should aim to be a low-gold campaign for two primary reasons – 1) to keep the price of tuition and the value of working a part-time job for money relevant, and 2) to emulate the starving student atmosphere of education. At least long enough for second term tuition to remain a consideration for the players. This does not preclude occasional successful hauls, of course.

We hope your education at the world-famous Waybury U is as magical as the classes!

207606.name: Tiny Frontiers Micro-Setting Mechanics
207606.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A small expansion of free rules for the Tiny Frontiers roleplaying game. This booklet introduces a new mechanic, rule, or item for each micro-setting in the Tiny Frontiers corebook.

You need the Tiny Frontiers corebook to play with this micro-expansion.

207607.name: The Temple of Ivy
207607.description:
From publisher blurb:

None know who built the Temple of Ivy, nor which deity it was made to honour. The abandoned temple has sat deep in the forest for centuries, it's doors magically sealed. A few brave souls that have scrambled though the few breaches in the wall report that the floor and walls are adorned with ivy symbols and carvings, but none know the meaning of them. And so, with the true name of the temple lost, this structure has come to be called the Temple of Ivy.

Need a quick map for an encounter?
A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 20 x 30 map depiciting an ancient and overgrown temple, located in a forest. Largely intact, this temple features a circular open air courtyard that leads to three distinct areas of the temple, some of which have weathered that effects of time more or less successfully.

207608.name: Milligan Class Hospital Ship
207608.description:
From publisher blurb:

Designed to replace the trio of aging Centaur-class hospital ships HMHS Centaur, Polkan and Kinnara in Royal Navy service, the Milligan-class was successfully exported even before the new ship design had been accepted and entered service, eventually serving in several of the larger national navies, system navies and defense forces across both Earth and Clement Sector.

The traditional role of a hospital ship is to provide medical care in times of armed conflict for the naval squadron’s personnel and marines it is attached to. But apart from this primary role, hospital ships such as the Milligan-class have a wide variety of secondary roles, often tasked to provide emergency response support where needed. They are in reality fully equipped mobile hospitals that are able to bring medical care directly to the location most needed.

Being only armed with sandcaster turrets and a point defense node array the Milligan-class relies on her ship’s identification beacon to announce her non-combatant, humanitarian role within naval service. Society owned hospital ships use the same beacon identification protocol that the military use with appropriate differences to broadcast operator status.

Ships of Clement Sector 15: Milligan-class Hospital Ship comes complete with beautiful views of the ship. The Milligan is presented with full deckplans and statistics to make your use of our product simple, easy and fun. In addition, the ship comes with a set of adventure hooks to get your characters right into the action as well as a short story written by Bradley Warnes.

Though designed specifically with our Clement Sector setting in mind, these ships could easily be used in any science fiction setting.

207609.name: Romance Trilogy
207609.description:
From publisher blurb:

A compendium of ground-breaking, romance themed role playing games. Revised versions of Breaking the Ice, Shooting the Moon and Under my Skin in one volume. Plus over 30 new hacks and rules variants of the games.

About the Games:

Breaking the Ice, see if two characters fall in love and stay together after their first three dates together. Shooting the Moon, a love triangle where two Suitors vie for the love of a shared Beloved. Play this game in your favorite genre or setting, and collaboratively create characters and a story of love and loss set there. Under my Skin, award winning freeform live action role playing game about a circle of friends who start falling in love with all the wrong people.

Rules light, story-focused systems, ranging in tone from light comedy to serious to tragic. Tabletop and freeform larp games included. Accommodates from 1 to 10 mature players. Good introductory games. Require minimal prep.

Sample Hacks & Mods

SUN AND MOON, a creation myth game inspired by Breaking the Ice
SLASHING THE VEIL, "shipping" your favorite characters in the manner of fanfiction (inspired by Alexander Newman and Phredd Groves)
STORY GAMES SEATTLE CUSTOM BLEND, a modified rules-set based on a community of play's philosophies and insights;
VERSUS NATURE, a non-romantic hack where Seekers compete to master the elements, adds four new roles to Shooting the Moon.
ERE CAMLANN, the classics loves and losses of Arthurian legend with a progressive spin;
NIGHT & DAY, a sequel game to Under my Skin, exploring how lives transform in the wake of romantic upheaval and change.

207610.name: Duel
207610.description:
From publisher blurb:

Have you ever wanted more story in your roleplaying game stories?

What you're about to read isn't a story unto itself. It's not a finely polished tabletop roleplaying game adventure. It's a template for a particular kind of story. It goes over the three-act structure for that plot type, and covers what has to happen in the beginning, the middle, and the end. It explains the sorts of things that you need to prepare before you start developing the story, and the things that you need to craft and develop after you've got the blueprint for your specific story put together. This book is designed to help you plan how to tell a rivalry story effectively, with the least amount of work possible. Because it's all about story, it is system-agnostic and useable with any genre or setting.

207611.name: Horrific Curses
207611.description:
From publisher blurb:

Curses of Doom!

Horrific Curses will bring your Pathfinder PCs to their knees begging for mercy from this collection of curses! This book brings you brand new accursed archetypes, including the accursed witch, hex hunter, and jinxed sorcerer bloodline. It also introduces a new category of magic, the dying spell, with 10 new spells like call the avenger and funeral pyre to allow heroes and villains alike to cast their spite upon their foes with their dying breath. Add to this nearly 20 brand-new curses from famine's feast and labile lunacy to kinslayer and hatemonger's halo, including spellblights and mythic curses, with each one as detailed as it is diabolical to create memorable curse effects that are vividly virulent. If you've ever wanted your curses to be more than just a simple spell, something to inspire delightful terror in your players, bring home the horror that only curses can deliver, grab this book and Make Your Game Horrific... and Legendary!

207612.name: Legend of Pula Noa
207612.description:
From publisher blurb:

After resupplying equipment, health, and morale, you have heard of a job opportunity available at a nearby pub. After first missing out on the chance, your fortunes change and get the job. After boarding the Gnome airship, the “Marietta”, you head off across the sea to locate the captain’s missing brother. You find out you will be going into the jungles of the lost Pula Noa tribe. Rumor and legend surround these natives as having streets and buildings paved in gold, silver, and death!

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition rules D&D for the Filbar Campaign for mid-level adventurers and DM. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

207613.name: Haunted Heroes Handbook
207613.description:
From the Back of the Book

It's one thing to face foes like ravenous beasts, fire-breathing dragons, and marauding monsters, but what about ghosts that can hop from body to body? How do you face a fiend that's using an innocent pawn as a proxy for its evil? Are there ways being haunted could be turned to your advantage? Prepare yourself for the answers to these questions and more as you explore what it's like to be a haunted hero!

Inside this book, you'll find:

New archetypes, feats, and traits that build upon your character's past and explore eerie powers gained from being haunted by spirits.





Rules for a new category of magic: haunted spells, which operate in ghostly ways to mimic the sinister manifestation of haunts.



An exploration of how different faiths of the Inner Sea region and beyond deal with haunts and the influence of the spirit world.


This Pathfinder Player Companion is intended for use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game and the Pathfinder Campaign Setting, but can be easily incorporated into any fantasy world.

207615.description:
From the publisher:

Race Across Harad is the second Adventure Pack in the Haradrim cycle for The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game.

Freshly seated atop the oliphaunts they captured and tamed, a small band of Middle-earth's greatest heroes begin their journey through the deserts and dangers of Harad. However, they don't get far before they hear the distant howling of wargs. And where the warg howls, there also the orc prowls.

The new scenario in Race Across Harad pits the heroes against these wargs and their riders, all within the treacherous wilds of Harad. Their towering oliphaunts may give the heroes an advantage, however, even their oliphaunts cannot keep the heroes safe for long from the warg-riders and their barbed arrows. Instead, their only choice is to quicken their pace and race toward the Ford of Harnen. There, the heroes' massive oliphaunts might be able to crash through waters too deep for the wargs to cross…

Featuring scenario-specific rules that allow the Orcs and wargs to pursue the heroes from their own staging area, Race Across Harad brings this frantic chase to life in dramatic fashion, as you and your friends need to progress through your quest stages more quickly than the Orcs progress through their own.

Simultaneously, the Adventure Pack introduces a new Dúnedain hero in the Lore sphere, as well as three copies each of nine different player cards that enhance a wide range of the game's existing keywords, Traits, and mechanics. You'll find support for everything from Mounts to side quests and from the Doomed keyword to the cycle's new focus on events that offer powerful rewards when you can target specific pairs of Traits.
207615.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Race Across Harad
boardgamefamily: Lord of the Rings: The Card Game (LCG)

207616.name: Alarums & Excursions (Issue 491 - Sep 2016)
rpgissuearticle: This Isn't the Zine You're Looking For

207617.name: A Learning Time (5E)
207617.description:
From publisher blurb:


Calling all Beginner D&D 5th Edition DMs and Players!

A D&D 5th Edition adventure for beginner players and DMs, 4 PCs of levels 1-2

Prepare to be schooled!

Exallizar Preparatory Academy is a place that, for generations, has trained the best and brightest heroes in the land. All of the students are the children of famous heroes, and as one of the fortunate attendees, it is your job to uphold the legacy of excellence attached to your family name.

As a student in Exallizar, you will be put through the paces like never before. This first year will see you and three strangers attempting the Gauntlet – a mysterious crucible that will put all of your studies to the test!

Also included in “A Learning Time”:

The first look at an exciting new miniature campaign setting specifically intended for D&D Basic
Four new iconic pre-generated PCs for quick and immersive play
A classic monster never before seen in the basic version of D&D
A grading system to let you know how well you’ve done at the end of the adventure
The first chapter of a series of seasonally thematic modules that can be run to completion in 3-6 hours

207618.name: Zotrix
207618.description:
User Summary

Not just a shooter, this game allows you to trade resources and plan various space routes.

207619.name: Golden Jaguar (HERO 6)
207619.description:
From publisher blurb:

This PDF contains a full write up on the Golden Jaguar. Sebastian Martinez was a talented but egotistical. archaeologist until the day he came into contact with the ancient Golden Jaguar Amulet. The amulet and Martinez bonded and the Golden Jaguar was born. Two consciousness now share Martinez's body. One, a thieving ladies-man and the other the fearsome Aztec warrior, Tonatiuth. The pair use their formidable skills to take what they want and to battle any that oppose them.

207620.name: Captain Conspiracy (ICONS)
207620.description:
From publisher blurb:

This PDF contains a full write up of Captain Conspiracy. An agent of a secret society dedicated to bringing about a New World Order. The society uses the Captain as a tool to spread terror and mistrust across the world. When not acting publicly, he uses his abilities to assassinate key officials to destabilize world governments.

207621.name: The New Game of Divers or Hidden Treasure
207621.description:
This game from Parker Brothers takes a concept used by early fishing games and re-themes it to divers trying to hook sunken treasure.

The game includes a fold-out cardboard "tank" about 9" square and 6.5" high. Each wall contains a mesh-covered arch through which players can see to some extent what they are doing. There are two foot-long wooden poles, each with a string dangling from one end leading to a 2.5"-tall deep-sea diver figure with a small metal hook at its feet. The treasure consists of small cardboard rectangles, each with a metal loop projecting from the back, and the type of treasure (gold, silver, jewels) printed on the bottom with a value.

The treasures are placed value down at the bottom of the tank, and players must dangle their divers over the wall, twisting the rods to try and hook the treasures. The game can be played as a race between two people that lasts until all the treasure has been retrieved. Or it can be played by more people, with each player getting three minutes to hook as much as possible. Either way, the largest value of treasure (not number of catches) wins the game.

207622.name: Ruin of the Reckless
207622.description:
Since the beginning of time, or maybe longer, this place has been here. It is a beacon of sorts, attracting the souls of those who both lived and died with recklessness in their hearts.

Bound by some unknown force, these wayward spirits cannot leave.

And so they remain… With time their souls will rot. They will fade away and they will be forgotten.

But even here there is hope… a legend whispered among the ghosts and specters. That any spirit to reach the tower’s peak will be granted one wish…

Source: The Game Website.

207623.name: The Enchanted Tower
207623.description:
This is a fantasy-themed roll-and-move game with a three-dimensional board. The board comes in three segments: two of these form a colorful truncated pyramid when pegged together, and the third forms a square ivy-covered stone tower that fits into the top of the pyramid.

Each side of the pyramid has 35 holes for pegs on a winding path up to the tower; each side of the tower has a further 11 holes leading to the window where the princess presumably awaits rescue.

Each player rolls a die to climb one side of the pyramid and then up the adjacent wall. There are no shortcuts up, but eight spaces have slides back down. First player to rescue the princess wins. The rules suggest a party variation, in which four "prizes" are placed in the tower, and players get to choose a prize in order of finish.

The box is not dated, but the game is listed in the 1946 Catalog of Copyright Entries.

207624.name: Haimrik
videogamehonor: 2017 PAX Curse Award Best Reveal of the Year Winner
2017 PAX Curse Award Editor’s Choice Winner
2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
207624.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




User Summary

Make words come to life in this action adventure unlike any other! Haimrik blends gameplay with the narrative of its story set in medieval times.

207625.name: Game of Liners and Transports
207625.description:
This is a game of global travel and trade. It consists of six miniature ships, two different spinners, and a four-section map of the world measuring roughly 35" x 20". The map bears a variety of different routes available (Panama vs. Cape Horn, Suez vs. Cape of Good Hope, etc.) that can be sailed in either direction.

The objective is to complete a trip around the world while picking up the greatest value of cargo. Players each start with a ship in New York and spin for their initial cargo. They then announce a direction and destination, and when they arrive at that port, can add a cargo based on the chief exports of that port as listed on the board.

When leaving a port, players who spin greater than 3 move quickly but face a financial penalty (for being delayed in port). The winner is not the player who completes the round the world voyage first, but whoever finishes with the highest total value of cargo. If a ship is destroyed by landing on a storm, all cargo is lost, the player gets a spin for insurance to offset the lost, but starts again from New York.

207627.name: Scrap Garden - The Day Before
207627.description:
User Summary

This is a new chapter in the story about the little rusty robot Canny who unwittingly finds himself in the midst of momentous events in Robo Land.

207629.description:
Set of 11 Encounter Tokens for use with Scythe.

PLEASE NOTE: This is not an official Stonemaier Games product. This is a 3D printed fan creation.
207629.name: Scythe: Encounter Tokens

207630.name: Subsiege
207630.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




In 2063 the world we know has ended. Overpopulation and extensive consumption have resulted in the depletion of the natural resource reservoirs on the continents. The last resources on earth lie 3000ft below the ocean surface.

An underwater resource war has broken out – with you as commanding officer right in the middle. Your mission: Secure earth’s last resources in the embattled deep-sea.

Source: The Game Website.

207631.name: Solstice Chronicles M.I.A.
207631.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




Solstice Chronicles: Missing in Action is a story-driven twin-stick shooter that focuses on tactical depth and complexity, where the gamer manipulates the pace of the game. Heavily driven by the ability to manage enemy spawn rate, it can be played tactically with twin-stick controls. This means that the player will either be able to enter a building, block the entrance, and search for supplies to ultimately destroy a nearby spawn point, or force monsters to spawn early. Each tactical decision will also have repercussions that gamers will need to manage.

Source: The Game Website.

207632.name: Lantern
207632.description:
“Once upon a time, there was a very sad princess. She felt so unloved and unhappy, that everything around her became grey and lifeless and the entire land was deprived of its color and joy. Our fable begins when a single, lonely lantern was lit in a faraway village…”

Be the wind and guide a beautiful sky lantern that spreads the powerful message of everlasting love, by bringing life and color back to the world around you. Enjoy four beautiful Asian-inspired worlds, each with a different theme, nature and architecture. Spread vibrant, happy colors through grey and lifeless lands by flying over them as a red, light-emitting lantern.

Source: The Game Website.

207633.name: Bikini Karate Babes
207633.description:
It features an all-female cast of 19 fighters, all clad in bikinis and played by real actresses. The game plays similarly to other 2D fighting games and has been likened to Street Fighter: The Movie and Mortal Kombat.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bikini_Karate_Babes Bikini Karate Babes]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

207634.name: Bikini Karate Babes 2: Warriors of Elysia
207634.description:
User Summary

Bikini Karate Babes 2 is the sequel to Bikini Karate Babes.

207635.name: Fossil Echo
207635.description:
Follow a boy's wordless journey as he climbs an ancient tower stretching above the clouds. Fossil Echo is a story-driven, short and challenging 2D platformer with hand drawn visuals. Why, and how did he get there? What will he find at the top?

Source: The Game Website.

207636.name: Shut Up and Dig
207636.description:
User Summary

You play an elf girl searching through underground caves and more often than not, carving out a passage. There are treasures and monsters.

207637.name: Old Man's Journey
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Visual Art Nominee
207637.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




A game about life, loss and hope.

Source: The Game Website.

207638.name: Night Blights
207638.description:
User Summary

Your task is to keep the Night Blight monsters distracted with toys or closed up in the wardrobes and fridges until dawn comes.

207639.name: Heroes Weekly (Vol 6, Issue 8 - Jaded Emperor)
207639.description:
From publisher blurb:

This week: A new Super Villain class for you to threaten your heroes with.

207640.name: Archetypes of Yog-Sothoth
207640.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dare You Venture Beyond the Gate?

The eldritch, the strange, and the weird are often relegated to the domains of villains and NPCs in fantasy, with the good guys being the ones who stand in the way of the dark things that remain just beyond our perception, which we can never truly understand. But sometimes, it can be fun to take on the mantle of the otherworldly, and to embrace the alien terrors of the cosmos. Each installment of Weekly Wonders: Eldritch Archetypes contains five archetypes for eldritch characters—those that are weird, alien, and otherworldly, who don’t fit in with normal society—as well as a cleric domain devoted to a specific mythos entity or race.

For this book, we focus on Yog-Sothoth. One of the most frequently used of H.P. Lovecraft’s creations, Yog-Sothoth first appeared in The Case of Charles Dexter Ward. A being of unimaginable power, Yog-Sothoth is said to be coterminous with all of time and space, and yet somehow outside it. The archetypes presented in this book, whether they reference Yog-Sothoth directly or not, adhere to themes of teleportation and space-time manipulation, as well as the creation of gates and portals. This book contains the following archetypes:

The dimensional sharpshooter, a gunslinger archetype that can fire bullets that phase through obstacles, or even make their bullets cause their victims to teleport to strange and far-off places.
The disciple of Yog-Sothoth, a monk archetype that can teleport himself and his foes, and whose touch can cause blindness, insanity, or even cause the creature to merge with Yog-Sothoth itself.
The servant of Umr-at-Tawil, a paladin archetype that can see the future and warp the fabric of reality in close proximity.
The keyholder, a summoner archetype, that specializes in summoning aberrations, rather than outsiders, and can teleport his eidolon and summoned creatures around the battlefield.
The Yog-Sothoth’s blade, a swashbuckler archetype that can teleport up to foes and deliver nasty surprise attacks, or even freeze victims in time.
A bonus cleric domain devoted to those who worship Yog-Sothoth.

207641.name: Aslan International Issue #11
rpgissuearticle: Please do not adjust your Brain
207641.description:
From the front cover:
Special "Pendragon" Issue, Plus "Double Sun" - Campaign Subzine

207642.name: Slayer
207642.description:
From publisher blurb:

Undefeatable 26 which focuses on Slayer has nearly 30 feats including Angel of Death, Elemental Slayer, Fluid Targeting, Master of My Enemy, Reactive Strategy and Shadow Camouflage that are perfect to be used in any game setting. This 5 page PDF is just the sort of thing needed for GMs to add depth to any great Pathfinder Roleplaying Game gaming session.

207643.name: Divergent Paths: Roil Dancer
207643.description:
From publisher blurb:

Divergent Paths offers new character options for the Path of War martial maneuver system of combat! In this first release, the roil dancer archetype is introduced. The roil dancer is an archetype for the kineticist class from Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures that gains maneuvers from Path of War.

Included in this 9-page PDF you will find:

The roil dancer archetype
seven new feats
One new magic item

207644.name: Metamorphosis Alpha Roleplaying Game Cores Rules
207644.description:
Publisher's Blurb

The Metamorphosis Alpha Roleplaying Game is a 160-page softcover book that comes with a free digital edition (available with a unique code included in the book). Use the System 26 rules and six-sided dice to play human or mutant characters, explore a vast and ruined starship, and fight for survival!

207645.name: The Scavenged Codex (Pathfinder)
207645.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hope for the Homeward Road

Marooned on an alien planet with few friends, your heroes discover a ray of hope - a possible way home! While wary of the corrupt denizens of Argosa, they must investigate such a promising lead, even if it takes convincing an inhuman crime boss to use his interplanetary gate to reach the desolate world of Rythes. Once there, the PCs face a harrowing journey across the wasteland peninsula of the Broken Baronies to locate the pieces of the Opus Aeterna. With mutant barbarians, misguided zealots, and savage predators challenging every step of the way, the PCs must use every ounce of luck, strength, skill, and guile to survive and in the process begin to unravel the mystery of the ancient Patrons and the nature of the Weave between worlds. With treachery on every hand, can they survive long enough to reclaim the wisdom of the ancients and their only hope of returning home lies in the pages of The Scavenged Codex?

The Scavenged Codex is an adventure for 5th to 8th level characters using using the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. The latest chapter in the amazing Legendary Planet Adventure Path, a spectacular sword-and-planet saga from Legendary Games blending sci-fi and fantasy, magic and machine with an exciting pulp sensibility and style. The Scavenged Codex includes not only a massive interplanetary adventure but also brand-new monsters, magic, technology, including new rules for vehicles, races, and chases, a full gazetteer of the planet of Rythes, and an ongoing fiction series. Here you will find amazing adventures that span the stars and plunder the planets in a campaign that takes your heroes to 20th level and beyond! Grab this exotic epic today and Make Your Game Legendary!

This 118-page PDF or 116-page print volume contains the following

"The Scavenged Codex," a Pathfinder adventure for 5th to 8th-level characters by Mike Shel and Mike Welham
A "Planetary Bestiary" by Mike Shel and Mike Welham, featuring the beautiful but deadly beghedi seedling, parasite, and mother plant; the rapacious chag beetle; the stealthy sand glutton; the warlike krang; the merciless syaandi; the disgusting oulbaene; and the sinister sarlu!
A collection of "Alien Treasures" by Mike Shel and Mike Welham, including 4 new magic items and 6 new technological items, from the Bellianic crown to the meteroite flare!
A gazetteer of the planet Rythes, "The One-Way World," by Mike Shel and Jonathan H. Keith.
A detailed exploration of fantasy vehicles, including rules for races and chases and brand-new vehicles like the deadcrawler, sand skiff, and sarlu aquarium by Tim Hitchcock and Jason Nelson.
A downloadable PDF art and map folio, featuring unkeyed player-friendly maps and more.
And last but not least, "Fixer," the second chapter in a 7-part short story by award-winning author Chris A. Jackson

207648.description: Frontier Ferry Trade Federation Ship is an alternative art promotional card for Star Realms, initially given out at Dragon Con 2016.
207648.name: Star Realms: Frontier Ferry Alternate Art Promo Card

207649.description: Lancer Star Empire Ship is an alternative art promotional card for Star Realms, initially given out at PAX West 2016.
207649.name: Star Realms: Lancer Alternate Art Promo Card

207650.description: Inner Peace is an alternative art promotional card for Epic Card Game, initially given out at Dragon Con 2016.
207650.name: Epic Card Game: Inner Peace Alternate Art Promo Card

207651.description: Secret Legion is an alternative art promotional card for Epic Card Game, initially given out at PAX West 2016.
207651.name: Epic Card Game: Secret Legion Alternate Art Promo Card

207652.name: Shadowrun Anarchy Prototype
207652.description:
From the back of the book:

Shadowrun. The Sixth World. Orks in pinstripe suits with uzis; mohawked dwarves jacked into vehicles racing through megasprawls at breakneck speed; humans casting fireballs at corporate-trained paracritters; elves hacking the Matrix for a datasteal of the latest tech or working to topple an upstart corp. It's where man meets magic and machine.

The Shadowrun: Anarchy Prototype preview a new way to get into the best cyberpunk/urban fantasy role-playing action around. Based upon the narrative-based and easy-to-learn Cue System, the Anarchy Prototype offers an advanced look at the core rules, a handful of characters and NPCs, and scenarios from the upcoming full version of Shadowrun: Anarchy. Jump into the prototype and get ready for a new way to harness Sixth World action!

207653.name: Warhammer 40.000: Kill Team
207653.description:
Brutal close-quarters combat in the 41st Millennium

The Game

No strength in numbers. No margin for error. Pure, fast-paced combat where tactics matter more than brute strength, and every action matters. A single shot can spell the difference between life and death, and a single decision can decide whether a battle ends in glorious victory or dismal defeat: this is Warhammer 40,000: Kill Team.

A whole new way to play games with your Warhammer 40,000 miniatures, this standalone two-player game puts you in charge of small bands of warriors, and gives you one objective – win, or die.

207656.name: Blockships
207656.description:
The illegitimate offspring of Space Invaders and Tetris

A game about building a bigger, better ship whilst blasting your buddies' to bits (and shouting about it).

Source: The Developer Website.

207657.name: Splitter Critters
207657.description:
Splitter Critters was originally built for the Ludum Dare 72 hour game jam where the theme was Shapeshift. After seeing it's potential we began working on a fully fledged version.

Source: The Game Website.

207658.name: Motorsport Manager
videogamehonor: 2016 Global Game Awards Best Management Game of the Year Nominee
207658.description:
Become the manager of a high-performance motorsport team. Motorsport Manager is a highly detailed, best-in-class management game for fans of motorsport. You’ll hire the drivers, build the cars and embed yourself in the dynamic world of motorsport.

Source: The Game Website.

207659.name: Sonic Mania
207659.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




Returning to the style of the 2D Sonic the Hedgehog games on the Sega Genesis and Sega CD, Sonic Mania is a sprite-based side-scrolling platformer in which players control Sonic, Tails, or Knuckles.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sonic_Mania Sonic Mania]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

207660.name: Mega Tagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies
207660.description:
It is a sequel to the high intensity hack 'n slash action game Neptunia U. Set in Gamicademi, Gamindustri's academy for CPUs and CPU candidates, Blanc and friends must film a movie to save their school, fend off zombies, and look cute at the same time.

Source: The Developer Website.

207662.name: Protodimension (Issue 27 - Sep 2016)
rpgissuearticle: The Proctor, Gamble, Johnson, and Johnson Tower

207665.name: Kick Ass Commandos
207665.description:
User Summary

A top-down 2D action game that sends you on commando missions to rescue captured soldiers and kill enemy soldiers.

207666.name: Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion
207666.description:
the game follows an oversized, anthropomorphic snail named Mortimer, who seeks to save a fantasy world's animal population. Players pilot Mortimer—whose shell can transform into an aircraft or submarine— through a 3D world, while solving riddles and learning simple biology.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mortimer_and_the_Riddles_of_the_Medallion Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

207667.name: Alarums & Excursions (Issue 207 - Nov 1992)
207667.description:
Alarums & Excursions
Issue 207
November 1992

Published as PDF in 2016

User summary:

Circulation for this issue was noted as 170.

207670.description:
